full_summary:
### ENERGY STAR Brand Monitoring Solicitation

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Number**: NRCan-5000083927
* **Tender Status**: Open
* **Publication Date**: 29 October 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2 December 2024, 14:00:00 (local time)
* **Contract Start Date (Expected)**: 1 April 2025
* **Contract End Date (Expected)**: 31 March 2026

**Service Requirements**

The solicitant is sought to provide a service that monitors the use of the ENERGY STAR® brand (name and marks) on online marketplaces across Canada. The service will focus on the most visible sites, including large-scale retailers and identified targets by Natural Resources Canada (NRCan). The objectives of this service include:
* Identifying instances of misuse of the ENERGY STAR® brand or marks, such as the ENERGY STAR certification mark on uncertified products
* Monitoring online marketplaces to ensure protection of the ENERGY STAR® brand

**Eligibility Requirements**

* Candidates must be Canadian organizations
* Candidates must have the capability to deliver the required services
* Candidates must provide references from previous similar services

**Award Criteria**

* Selection of candidates will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price

**Notice of Tender**

* This solicitation is a Request for Proposal, open to all interested tenders
* Eligibility and tender submission requirements are outlined in the attached tender notice
* Contact Information:
	+ Mr. Len Pizzi, Natural Resources Canada, (343) 550-5308, len.pizzi@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca
* Relevant documentation is attached to this notice, available in both English and French

**Note**

Please be aware that this notice is written in Markdown format. The solicitor will not respond to inquiries regarding the format of the notice, but rather direct you to any relevant documentation. Markup for formatting is added for ease of reading only. [See Attachment](<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50200/rfp-5000084275.pdf>)
